short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save the words you frequently search for so you can easily access them with a click, rather than typing them out each time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can find any word you want without typing it again.

Functionality:
1.Add words that you want to save and find later.
2.Click on a word to find it on the webpage.
3.Delete a word by clicking the "X" button.

Shortcut to open it faster:
Window -> Ctrl + Shift + F
Mac -> Command + E
